_header: Ye may see what he is and what he suffered [Ȝe mo se what he ys & what he suffrede]
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Christ, sufferings of
_description: On Christ’s suffering for our sake — six lines, incomplete

ArrBM184.Transcription:
Ȝe mo se what he ys & what he suffrede& what he ys in
                    godhede& what he suffrede for owre mys dedeSertes in his godhede
                    he ys sothefastnesse& for owre mys dede suffrede he deth &
                    wrechidnessefor he felle down in þe strete…
